title: The seasonable case of submission to the church-government as now re-established by law, briefly stated and determined by a lover of the peace of this church and kingdom.
author: Honyman, Andrew, 1619-1676.
notes: Written by Andrew Honyman.  Cf. Wing.
Caption title: The case anent submission to the present curch-government re-established by law, stated and considered.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
